divs: Sighting DetailsWhile star gazing as I do every night, I've noticed lights moving across the sky - as bright as a star, various directions. No unusual start-stop motions, but they do seem appear from nowhere and end the same way. They seem to flicker on, then off. Movement is in a straight line - but not a satellite or a plane. Wanted to report because it has been happening often; 2-3 times every night for the last 3 nights.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Englewood
There were no other sightings in Englewood on or around November 30th 2010
